content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences or preferences, but here are some popular pubs and restaurants in Barnstaple that serve local cuisine:

1. The Corner Bistro - This intimate bistro serves classic British dishes made with fresh, locally sourced ingredients. 2. The Bell Inn - This historic pub in Chittlehampton, located on the outskirts of Barnstaple, serves traditional pub food with local produce, including locally sourced meats and seafood. 3. The Poltimore Arms - Located in the village of North Molton, this traditional pub serves a range of beer and ale, alongside classic pub meals using local ingredients. 4. The Riverbank Bar and Bistro - This popular restaurant is located on the River Taw and serves a range of modern British and European dishes using locally sourced ingredients. 5. The Thatched Inn - This charming, 14th-century inn serves traditional pub meals made with locally sourced ingredients, alongside a range of local beers and ciders. 6. The Royal and Fortescue Hotel - This historic hotel in the heart of Barnstaple features two restaurants, serving modern British and European cuisine made with local ingredients. These are just a few examples. There are many other pubs and restaurants in Barnstaple that serve local cuisine. Be sure to check the local listings or ask locals for recommendations when you visit.
